description: AveComics is the most advanced comic books app. AveComics for Hewlet-Packard WebOS Tablets allows you to buy and read Comic Books, Mangas and Graphic Novels in AVE format using a revolutionary reader. AveComics offers a full page reader that will pan and zoom for you while maintaining your preferred zoom factor. It includes an inbuilt Comic-Shop where you can buy from a growing selection of comics and graphic novels in french, english and spanish (Over 1200 titles available...and counting). Free content is also made available. All the comics you buy get added to the application's shelf. AveComics is a platform. You buy ONCE, you read ANYWHERE, in a format that is suited to your device (computer, smartphones, tablets...). For more information, visit avecomics.com
